title: Mixed Emotions - My Reaction to Mozilla Layoffs & New CEO.
description:
Mozilla is changing their products, has a new CEO, and has done some layoffs—here are some initial reactions and what we can expect as a community going forward for the privacy and security space!

Hardening Firefox Video: https://youtu.be/F7-bW2y6lcI
Mullvad Browser Video: https://youtu.be/tsrt1elZ9FE
Why I No Longer Harden Firefox: https://youtu.be/N67kJLaWtoA

🔐 Our Website: https://techlore.tech
🕵 Go Incognito Course - to learn about privacy: https://techlore.tech/goincognito
